text: have an important Amazon chime meeting
to record this video shows you
how recording your Amazon chime meetings
can be initiated from any Amazon chime
client desktop or mobile only the
meeting organizer or their delegates
have permission to record choose more
then record
meeting attendees on the Amazon chime
app may see a notification that the call
is being recorded and a record icon in
the meeting window dial in users and
anyone joining after the recording has
begun may hear a Quee indicating that
recording has been
enabled if you're on the go and running
the meeting from your mobile device no
worries choose options then record
meeting the recording ends when you
choose record again or when the meeting
is over the Amazon chime servers process
the recording and may take a few minutes
depending on the length of the recording
after the processing is complete the
Amazon recordings user sends you the
recording file this is an MP3 file for
an audio only meeting or an mp4 file if
there was screen sharing recorded one
thing to note is that user video is not
captured in a meeting recording open the
link in the message thread to download
the meeting
recording to locate an older recording
choose messages then Amazon chime
recordings you can also Mark Amazon
timee recordings as a favorite contact
for quick
reference that's it now you can record
your meetings and access them at any
time
